40155702.name: QA Инженер / Тестировщик
40155702.description:
POWr, a fast-growing San Francisco-based startup is in search of a QA Tester to join our Kazakhstan team in Almaty. At POWr, we embrace a fast-moving, high energy, and ever-improving environment. Our ideal candidate is someone who's passionate about customer experience and is eager to help POWr users grow their business online.

✔️ Duties:

- Become an absolute expert in the POWr product range (a suite of website plugins)

- Execute test cases and report detailed bug reports to developers and the product team

- Design and implement manual test cases for new and existing features

- Work with our engineering team on getting new features and products launched successfully (and bug-free!)

- Give continuous feedback on usability, design, and potential pitfalls of new features

✔️ Requirements:

- Verbal and written English communication skills

- Ability to work in a fast-paced Agile environment

- Knowledgeable in (or willing to learn) HTML, CSS, Javascript, and git

- Experience using browser developer tools is a plus

- Basic experience using Slack, Skype, GSuite, Jira for communication and task management

- Reliable and organized - our engineering team will rely on you to get their projects released on time

- 1-2 years of experience in a QA oriented role is preferable

40365232.name: Помощник системного администратора
40365232.description:
Обязанности:
  • организация рабочих мест;
  • техническая поддержка пользователей (офис 50 человек + удаленная поддержка до 50 человек), настройка и обслуживание ПК;
  • ввод в эксплуатацию техники, диагностика, мелкий ремонт оргтехники;
  • предоставление необходимой помощи пользователям, оперативное реагирование на заявки сотрудников;
  • закупки оборудования, общение с поставщиками компьютерной техники;
  • закупки и замена расходных материалов;
  • заключения и контроль существующих договоров с провайдерами, телефонными операторами;
  • установка ПО на рабочие компьютеры сотрудников, в зависимости от специфики работы;
  • настройка и обслуживание банк-клиентов;
  • работа с локальной сетью компании, настройка ЛВС, прокладка кабеля для ЛВС;
  • удаленная поддержка пользователей.
Требования:
  • образование не ниже среднего специального;
  • опыт работы системным администратором от 1 года;
  • базовые знания OC Windows Server 2012/2016;
  • уверенные знания Win 7/8/10;
  • базовые знания Active Directory, знание сети, базовые знания виртуализации;
  • опыт установки и настройки типового офисного ПО;
  • опыт настройки и обслуживания офисной техники (принтеры, сканеры);
  • опыт настройки сети и понимание функционирования;
  • опыт настройки рабочих мест пользователей;
  • ответственность и самостоятельность в работе.
Условия:
  • Устройство по ТК РФ
  • Оплачиваемый отпуск и больничный лист.
  • График 5-2, с 9 до 18
  • Офис в современном Бизнес Центре до 10 минут транспортом от м. Тушинская
  • Полный рабочий день на территории работодателя
  • Адрес: Москва, Волоколамское шоссе 142, м. Тушинская

39860228.name: Sales Manager
39860228.description:
Aurigma is an international company that develops software for product personalization and online document editing. Since 2002 our software has been used by hundreds of millions of users across the globe. We are looking for a diligent person who is fluent in English and has strong communication skills.

Job brief

This a position for a talented communicator that is passionate about technology and enjoys selling it. You would be working with B2B clients and in-bound generated leads from across the world.

Requirements:

  • Strong command of English (Upper-Intermediate or higher). If you don’t have good speaking and listening skills, you at least have to be willing to improve rapidly.
  • Modern sales skills: an ability to add value, be customer-centric, follow-up efficiently and close deals as well as generate new business from inbound leads.
  • An ability to efficiently qualify and disqualify prospects.
  • General understanding of IT technologies (or willingness to learn).
  • Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
  • Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
  • Higher education in an IT-relevant field is a plus.

Responsibilities:

  • Work together with a Sales Engineer on acquiring new deals.
  • Achieve agreement upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
  • Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
  • Continuously improve through feedback
  • Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
  • Schedule and conduct meetings and presentations with prospects.
  • Work in a late shift (3 pm – 12 am).

About the project:

Our flagship product – Customer’s Canvas – is an online W2P editor that is integrated into websites of our customers. In short, it’s a modern way to bring Photoshop and InDesign-baked templates to the web. The product is used by hundreds of companies in 30 countries.

Aurigma is a product-based company which means that we have expertise in software development, marketing, product management, sales, and support.

We offer:

  • A wholesome work environment with a comfortable office (non-open space).
  • On-boarding plan and compensation of English classes.
  • Competitive salary and commission that can grow with your skills and competence.
  • Official employment.
  • Mixed-age team of professionals with a strong work ethic and wholesome work culture.
  • Flexible work hours (40-hour workweek) with a late shift schedule (3 pm – 12 am).
  • Modern PC, two monitors, coffee machine, dining area.
  • New professional challenges that allow you to advance in your career every day.

40231272.name: Strong Front-end Engineer (Angular)
40231272.description:
GET REAL. GET GOING.

Get the feeling of real-life impact and experience a new level of being challenged.
Meet Neocles!

Engineer Digital Simplicity… and run it.
We build and run a business-critical transactional SaaS platform that powers several globally operating brands. Our clients care about digitizing and optimizing their self-service selling and buying operations to perfection. We care about their success. To improve their business our web and mobile-based platform provides retailers with the experience to easily place large orders with our clients. At Neocles you work on a product that is transforming the way big brands do business. Also a cool fact to share: We have been named "Cool Vendor in Digital Commerce" by Gartner in their 2020 report.

Get Informed about us in short

Product Summary:

  • The product: Sales & buying application for leading brands
  • The stack: C# | .NET | Angular | Azure | Elastic | Kibana
  • The clients: PUMA, Bestseller, Ecco, Brooks & Esprit (and more to come)
  • The team: ± 40 people (over 90% is in a scrum team) based in Amsterdam & Kiev

A Day in a Frontend Engineer's Life:

  • Take responsibility in developing a user-friendly and versatile application;
  • Develop new features and improve stability of the front-end application using Angular 10 that powers both our web and native mobile app;
  • Work closely within your cross-functional Scrum Team consisting of UX, front-end, back-end and QA engineers;
  • Build things the right way and pursue clean code;
  • Work disciplined, improve constantly, bring new ideas and co-pilot our clients;

What will we expect from you?

Technically:

  • You’re highly skilled in Angular 2+, RxJS, JavaScript, TypeScript, SCSS
  • You know how to define and integrate with REST APIs
  • You have knowledge of Unit Testing
  • Sure, it would be great if you also have knowledge of mobile development, Azure or UX design… but: your ability and motivation to learn new tools and techniques are more important;
  • Today we’re working with the technology of tomorrow;
  • You have cool experience or want to try new technology that brings value? We will support you!

Soft Skills:

  • You are proactive, communicative with good stress on leadership;
  • You're a team player that operates across teams and clients;
  • You are serious about work and motivated to get better;
  • You love challenges, continuous change, and accountability;
  • You are honest.

GET THE REAL DEAL

Some perks you get working with us:

  • Have an unlimited study and get reimbursed for it: English courses, professional courses, mentoring;
  • We support your development with your personal growth plan on all levels: tech skills, soft skills, salary;
  • We give you the possibility to work in mixed teams across Ukraine and Amsterdam;
  • Re-evaluation of your hard skills, soft skills & salary plan every 6 months;
  • Yearly trip to Amsterdam to work from our HQ;
  • International annual company trip: we go and work from somewhere together for a week (Malaga was last destination), having nice breakfasts and dinners together;
  • Yearly trip to Amsterdam to work from our HQ;
  • We don’t like to micromanage, you work according to your personally established OKR’s in the system;
  • We have a friendly atmosphere with a lot of challenges and humour.

Professional winnings:

  • Get in the zone: You’ll discover your true capabilities. Stretch and grow.
  • Get more done: You’ll get to get more done.
  • Get Together: You’ll join a team that enjoys the thrill of hard work.
  • Get Growing: You’ll learn fast by experiencing ‘honest discomfort’.
  • Get serious: You’ll get more reality in our no-nonsense environment.

Get in touch
You care about moving forward? Hopefully we got you thinking. The first step in closing this ‘real deal’ is finding out if you and Neocles are a potential match. It’s up to you: apply directly online, drop by the office for a coffee or get in touch to schedule a (video) call with the team first. Any questions?

After applying our recruiter will review your application and have a ‘screen call’ with you. Positive outcome? You’ll be asked to take a code test at home. Great result? You’ll have a first interview with our developers and a second interview with our CEO (John Scully) and COO (Sohrab Hosseini). All good? We’ll send you an offer and… Get Going.

32647467.name: Scala Engineer
32647467.description:
Evolution is a world-leading B2B provider of video-streamed Live Dealer gaming, committed to deliver a unique and flawless gameplay across multiple platforms through revolutionary product innovation. Firmly rooted in our values: ALIVE, do RIGHT and work TOGETHER, we are on a quest to lead the way in an industry which is pioneering technical solutions and pushing the limits of what has been done in terms of online user experience.

Our services have won multiple industry awards, including 'Live Casino Supplier of the Year' at the 2019 EGR B2B Awards for nine consecutive years and 'Casino Content Provider of the Year' in the 2019 EGR North America Awards.

Our success is largely down to the quality and commitment of our people. We are now looking for an experienced and driven engineer. This is truly an exciting opportunity for a talented individual who is looking for a career in a dynamic and international work environment.

Evolution Gaming Group AB (publ) was founded in 2006 and it is stock listed on the Swedish stock exchange Nasdaq. Today, about 8000 people work in the company's 14 sites, including locations such as the U.S., Malta, Latvia, Georgia, the Netherlands, Canada, Estonia, Belarus, the U.K. and Sweden.

Job Description

We are searching for passionate Scala Engineers. We thrive in well-designed, scalable, systems which use modern functional programming based design approaches. We believe that the functional programming approach in Scala results in systems which are easier to build and maintain - we use modern, pragmatic approaches such as Tagless Final and libraries such as Cats and Cats Effect to achieve this.

You will need to:

  • Be proactive, pragmatic and professional, deliver results;
  • Write code that make our games and related functionality run;
  • Write unit and other automated tests;
  • Work and communicate efficiently with the rest of the development team, including PO, front-end developers and designers;
  • Actively participate in code reviews so that code delivered by you and your team is of great quality;
  • Own your applications, ensure they deploy and run 24/7 on our Kubernetes platform with great performance;
  • Be ready to invest the effort to become an even better developer;

To succeed in this role you should have:

  • Passion for our profession, in particular Scala and Functional Programming, and improving yourself technically
  • Proven experience in delivering production software using Scala or comparable experience, such as extensive JVM or Haskell experience
  • Interest in the latest programming trends such as functional and reactive programming
  • Excellent communication skills and a pragmatic approach to problem solving
  • Highly proficient in spoken and written English
  • Bachelor’s Degree in IT or equivalent.

We will appreciate:

  • Experience building high performance clustered systems, modular FP-based architecture, as well as actor systems, where they are necessary;
  • Experience in Cats / Scalaz, Cats Effect, ZIO, Monix, Akka Actors, Persistence, Cluster & HTTP, http4s, Tagless Final and/or Scala.js.
  • Experience with Event Sourcing & CQRS;
  • Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, Cassandra.

We offer:

  • Entrepreneur culture of the company, which allows you to try new approaches and technologies all the time;
  • Recognition from the business which translates to very competitive salaries and a supportive attitude;
  • Developing games featuring live video serving customers around the world;
  • A healthy mix of startup-like culture of the company, which enables us to try new approaches and technologies and remain on the edge of technological development and enterprise, with stability and supporting functions to help you focus on your job;
  • Modern and developer-friendly delivery processes, including Agile (Scrum / Kanban), JIRA issue tracking, Confluence wiki, GitLab source control, Jenkins continuous integration and delivery, modern hardware and software for development (an IDE of your choice);
  • Being a part of an international team in a successful, publicly traded company;
  • Health insurance, contemporary office environment, tech conference attendance, training, hackathons and other benefits and perks.

40143923.name: PR Executive/ Propaganda Minister
40143923.description:
Trood is an automation engine for businesses and startups.

In addition to our business automation clients, by now 5 partner startups with a total capitalization of more than $10M have used Trood.

We have been working on corporate automation projects since 2010th, and specifically on the Trood platform since 2014th. Now we have raised our first investments, and are currently preparing our platform and boxed business solutions for international expansion.

We started building a community of developers, integrators, startups, and consultants around the Trood ecosystem.

We are looking for a Partner, who will dive into our specifics, and help us convey our ideas and principles to customers, engineers, and partners, growing our community in the US, Russia, and everywhere. We truly believe our efforts can change the way how people implement and use business software and fulfill tech product ideas.

Requirements.

Despite of your level and experience, we have damn lots of work to be done. Ability to learn, execute and collaborate is crucial, while public relations, marketing, product promotion, copywriting experience is super-welcomed.

What else do we need for sure:

  • Perfect collaboration skills
  • Perfect writing skills
  • Russian close to ideal (or just ideal which would be better)
  • At least advanced English (C2 is cute)
  • Deep interest in the IT market and the ability to study it
  • Thirst in performing bright things

Scope of application.

  • Public Relations
  • Markets investigation
  • Collaboration with marketing dept activities
  • Copywriting
  • PR strategy development and implementation
  • Making scientific stuff sexy
  • Collaborating on all this ^ with Trood-powered startups

Terms and conditions.

Initially, we offer to start working on per-project terms for 2-3 months and then decide on a full-time relationship.

In any case, what do we need is a job to be professionally done, without much restriction to your schedule and location.

We pay within the market range. We offer a US stock option program for key employees.

Specific conditions are to be individually discussed.

Position interviewing process:

• Introductory phone interview with a team member, 15 min

• Responding to a short questionnaire, the document will additionally contain the position's typical business tasks, reference links, and materials, to familiarise the applicant

• 2-part zoom or office interview with the CMO and CEO, 45-60 min.

Looking forward to hearing from you!
